1.content: Deploy SolClock to Vercel with mock data
1.details:
1. ✅ Fixed Vercel build error by removing pnpm-store dependency
2. ✅ Updated pnpm-lock.yaml to match package.json
3. ✅ Added .pnpmrc configuration for proper pnpm store locations
4. ✅ Created vercel.json for explicit build configuration
5. ✅ Updated package.json build script to disable frozen lockfile
6. ✅ Successfully tested local build without /tmp errors
7. ✅ Committed and pushed fix to GitHub (commit 316c915)
8. ✅ Simplifed gitignore to resolve /tmp references
9. ✅ Pushed simplified configuration (commit dd398ed)
10. ✅ Awaiting Vercel deployment completion
11. ⏳ Vercel should now work with simplified Next.js config

2.content: Set up Supabase database from scratch
2.details:
1. ⏳ Open Supabase dashboard and navigate to SQL Editor
2. ⏳ Load and execute supabase-schema.sql
3. ⏳ Create all 8 required tables
4. ⏳ Set up Row Level Security policies
5. ⏳ Configure database indexes
6. ⏳ Verify table creation
7. ⏳ Test database connection

3.content: Replace mock data with real Supabase integration
3.details: 1. Update API routes to fetch from Supabase 2. Implement real data fetching functions 3. Add error handling for empty database 4. Test API endpoints with real data 5. Update UI components to display real data

4.content: Test and optimize the complete system
4.details: 1. Test all pages with real data 2. Verify performance and loading states 3. Add loading indicators where needed 4. Final deployment verification
